mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.description, a.course_id, c.course_name, a.deadline, a.attachment_path, a.create_time, a.update_time FROM assignment a LEFT JOIN course c ON a.course_id = c.id WHERE a.course_id = #{courseId}
